title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8132.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8132.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Routes 14A and
245 between RM 14A-4405-1047+- (intersection of Route 14A and Route 245), and

Routes 5 and 20 in the Towns of Seneca and Geneva. (b) Routes 5 and 20 between Routes 21 and 332
and RM 5-4405-4019+- (400+- feet east of Lake Street in the City of Geneva) in
the Cities of Canandaigua and Geneva, and Towns of Geneva, Seneca, Hopewell and

Canandaigua. (c) Route 332 between
RM 332-4401-1002+- (East Gibson Street), and IR 90 (New York State Thruway) in
the City of Canandaigua and Towns of Canandaigua and Farmington. (d) Route 14. Route 14 between I-90 (New York

State Thruway) in the City of Geneva, and Towns of Geneva and Phelps and

Exchange Street in the City of Geneva. (e) [Eff. until July 11, 2001, see also
subd. (e) below.] Route 96. Route
96 between I-490 and CR 7 in the Towns of Victor, Farmington and Manchester, and the Village of Victor. (e) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (e) above.] Route 96. Route 96 between I-490
and the Ontario-Seneca county line in the Towns of Victor, Farmington, Manchester, Phelps and the Villages of Victor and Phelps. (f) Route 96 from Eagle Street to Route 14 in
the Village and Town of Phelps. (g) Route 247 between Routes 5 and 20 and Route 245 in the Towns of Hopewell and

Gorham. (h) [Repealed]
(i) CR 3. CR 3, between Maple Street and

Route 20C, in the Village of Holcomb and the Towns of Victor and East

Bloomfield. (j) Routes 5 and 20. Routes 5 and 20, between the Ontario-Livingston county line and Rabbit Run, in
the Towns of West Bloomfield and East Bloomfield. (k) Route 5/US Route 20. Route 5/US Route 20, between the Ontario-Livingston county line and the Ontario-Seneca county line, in the Towns of West Bloomfield, East Bloomfield, Canandaigua, Hopewell, Seneca, Geneva and in the Village of Bloomfield and in the Cities of

Canandaigua and Geneva. (l) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (l) below.] Route 96. Route 96 between Route
332 and Route 21 in the Towns of Farmington and Manchester. (l) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also
subd. (l) above.]
[Repealed]
(m) CR 28. CR 28 between

Route 96 and North Street in the Towns of Farmington and Canandaigua. (n) Route 444. Route 444 between Route 96 and
US Route 20/Route 5 in the Towns of Victor and East Bloomfield, and in the

Villages of Victor and Holcomb. (o) Route 14. Route 14 (South Main Street and Lochland Road) between North

Cloverleaf Drive and the Ontario-Yates county line in the City of Geneva and
the Town of Geneva. (p) Kendall

Street. Kendall Street between West Main Street and Route 96 in the Village of

Clifton Springs and Town of Manchester. (q) Route 21. Route 21 between Route 5 and US
Route 20 and the Ontario-Steuben county line in the Towns of Canandaigua, South

Bristol, Naples and the Village of Naples. (r) Route 64. Route 64 between Route 5 and US
Route 20 and Route 21 in the Towns of East Bloomfield, Bristol and South

Bristol. (s) Gorham Street. Gorham

Street between Route 21 and a distance of 0.5 mile south of Route 21 in the

Town of Canandaigua and City of Canandaigua. (t) Route 53. Route 53 between Route 21 and
the Ontario-Steuben county line in the Village of Naples and the Town of

Naples. (u) CR 19. CR 19 between

Route 21 and CR 13 in the Towns of Hopewell and Manchester. (v) Route 245. Route 245 between the
intersection of Routes 14A/245 and the Ontario-Yates county line in the Village
of Rushville and the Towns of Gorham and Seneca. (w) Route 245. Route 245 between the

Ontario-Yates county line and Route 21 in the Village of Naples and the Town of

Naples. (x) Route 21. Route 21
between the Ontario-Wayne county line and Route 332 in the Towns of Manchester, Hopewell, Canandaigua, in the Village of Manchester and the City of

Canandaigua. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8132.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
